replies.bodyText: I gather that is how continuation is known when an "async" method is complete. That must be standard, eh?
replies.author: drwill-ms

replies.bodyText:
yeah, since you subscribe to these async APIs, the calling thread will resume irrespective of the state of the async API call.
Since our subsequent operations are dependent on the previous operations, we have to "block" the thread until the async call completes.
